      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mailbox()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mailbox

        public Mailbox()
        Create a mailbox with a buffer of three elements that receive message from five senders

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Run a loop where every time, if there is free space into the buffer, it receives a message from the first available sender. It inserts the message and signals the receiver a new one is available.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • receiveFrom

        public Message<java.lang.Integer> receiveFrom()
        Extract a message from the buffer, if there is one, and return it
        Returns:
        A Message that contains the data and the name of the sender thread

      • getPort

        public PortVector<java.lang.Integer> getPort()
        Make available the portVector
        Returns:
        A PortVector that represent the mailbox
